t: Johnson & Johnson unites business segments under its brand in UK
s: April 30, 2024 - Johnson & Johnson spun off its consumer healthcare division last year. Kenvue now owns over-the-counter names like Tylenol and Calpol, as well as skin and health care brands like Aveeno and Clean & Clear.
